mapper.select:
select * from movie
and movie_cn_name like '%${movieCnName}%'
order by movie_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into movie (movie_cn_name, movie_actor, movie_director, movie_detail, movie_duration, movie_type, movie_releaseDate, movie_country, movie_picture, movie_state) values (#{movieCnName}, #{movieActor}, #{movieDirector}, #{movieDetail}, #{movieDuration}, #{movieType}, #{movieReleasedate}, #{movieCountry}, #{moviePicture}, #{movieState})
mapper.update: update movie set movie_cn_name = #{movieCnName}, movie_actor = #{movieActor}, movie_director = #{movieDirector}, movie_detail = #{movieDetail}, movie_duration = #{movieDuration}, movie_type = #{movieType}, movie_releaseDate = #{movieReleasedate}, movie_country = #{movieCountry}, movie_picture = #{moviePicture}, movie_state = #{movieState} where movie_id = #{movieId}
